Articles.Content: Today I was bored so I thought I should attempt drawing a kerbal. I'm not an artist and I draw with a mouse and this was made using GIMP.

Wow,thats really cool!

Though the continents on kerbin look too leafy.
Nicely done, I have to say

It looks traced.

Rule Number Two of Art: NEVER. EVER. TRACE.
Pretty cool man, very nice indeed

Wow,thats really cool!

Though the continents on kerbin look too leafy.

Yeah I was trying that out and thats what I got

It looks traced.

Rule Number Two of Art: NEVER. EVER. TRACE.

I admit that I traced but it would've looked terrible if I didn't.

I was wondering if I could use this image for cover art of a fanfiction I am writing.

I am a brony who is writing a story about Kerbals basically landing on the moon of equstria. I have a few friends helping me but I still need cover art and I was looking around and found your, rather impressive, drawing. I know that sometimes people can find bronies to be strange or wouldn't want to be associated with them so I am asking you for permission to use your artwork as part of the cover art of my story.

Do I have permission to use your artwork?

It looks traced.

Rule Number Two of Art: NEVER. EVER. TRACE.

Tracing's not always bad. it depends on the situation I suppose

As someone with very limited art skills i find this very impressive.

Thought about doing another?
